Artefact.Name: Sword of Striking
Artefact.Description: +1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Sword of Battle
Artefact.Description: +1 Attack

Artefact.Name: Sword of Might
Artefact.Description: +1 Strenght

Artefact.Name: Biting Blade
Artefact.Description: -1 Armour save

Artefact.Name: Enchanted shield
Artefact.Description: 5+ Armour save

Artefact.Name: Talisman of Protection
Artefact.Description: 6+ Ward save

Artefact.Name: Staff of Sorcery
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: +1 to dispell
Artefact.Description: +1 to dispell

Artefact.Name: Dispell Scroll
Artefact.Description: automatically dispel an enemy spell, one use only

Artefact.Name: Power Stone
Artefact.Description: +2 dice to cast a spell

Artefact.Name: War Banner
Artefact.Description: +1 Combat Resolution

Artefact.Name: Crown of Horns
Artefact.Description: The model and any unit he is with are Stubborn.

Artefact.Name: Slug-Skin
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Enemy models in base contact with the model at the start of any round of close combat suffer a Strength 3 hit before any blows are struck
Artefact.Description: Enemy models in base contact with the model at the start of any round of close combat suffer a Strength 3 hit before any blows are struck.

Artefact.Name: Many-Limbed Fiend
Artefact.Description: The model may make a bonus attack in addition to his normal attacks. This bonus attack is always at the model's basic Strength and is never augmented by equipment or magic weapons.

Artefact.Name: Gouge-Tusks
Artefact.Description: All of the model's close combat attacks are armour piercing.

Artefact.Name: Gnarled Hide
Artefact.Description: The model has a scaly skin save of 5+, which is cumulative with other armour as normal.

Artefact.Name: Rune of The True Beast
Artefact.Description: Ridden monsters, monsters, the steeds pulling chariots, cavalry mounts and swarms suffer -1 To Hit the model bearing the Rune of the True Beast in close combat, although their riders may attack as normal.

Artefact.Name: Uncanny Senses
Artefact.Description: The model has +1 Initiative.

Artefact.Name: Shadow-Hide
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: When at least partially in cover, a further -1 To Hit modifier is applied when enemies shoot at the character
Artefact.Description: When at least partially in cover, a further -1 To Hit modifier is applied when enemies shoot at the character.

Artefact.Name: Primeval Club
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: When rolling To Wound, the character's Strength is treated as equal to the unmodified Leadership value of the target model
Artefact.Description: When rolling To Wound, the owner's Strength is treated as equal to the unmodified Leadership value of the target model.

Artefact.Name: Axe of Men
Artefact.Description: This weapon has the Killing Blow special rule. In addition, if the bearer kills an enemy character in a challenge, he and any unit he leads are Unbreakable and cause Terror so long as he leads them.

Artefact.Name: Stonecrusher Mace
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: When rolling To Wound against war machines and chariots or buildings, the character's Strength is increased to 10
Artefact.Description: Stonecrusher Mace confers +3 Strength. When rolling To Wound against war machines and chariots (including War Altars, War Shrines, Steam Tanks and Corpse Carts, and so on) or buildings, the character's Strength is increased to 10.

Artefact.Name: Mangelder
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Any model wounded by this character loses 1 point of Leadership for each Wound it suffers
Artefact.Description: The bearer causes Terror. In addition, any model wounded by this weapon loses 1 point of Leadership for each Wound it suffers.

Artefact.Name: Hunting Spear
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Spear can be thrown with a range of 24", resolve each hit like a single bolt from a bolt thrower
Artefact.Description: The Hunting Spear counts as a spear in close combat. It can be thrown with a range of 24". Resolve each hit like a single bolt from a bolt thrower (see the main rule book). Note that you may shoot after moving (but not marching) and 'stand and shoot' with the Hunting Spear.

Artefact.Name: Axes of Khorgor
Artefact.Description: Requires two hands. The bearer gains +1 Attack and may re-roll any missed To Hit rolls in close combat.

Artefact.Name: The Steel-Claws
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Extra D3 Attacks (roll at the beginning of each round of close combat)
Artefact.Description: Requires two hands. The Steel-Claws confer an extra D3 Attacks to the wielder (roll at the beginning of each round of close combat). If a 6 is rolled when determining the number of attacks, all the bearer's attacks that round will ignore armour saves.

Artefact.Name: The Brass Cleaver
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Bonus attack against each of the models in base contact with the bearer
Artefact.Description: The Brass Cleaver confers a single bonus attack against each of the models in base contact with the bearer. In a challenge it confers one bonus attack and no more.

Artefact.Name: Everbleed
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Every time an enemy model suffers an unsaved wound from this weapon, roll a D6: on the result of a 6, the enemy loses an additional wound, with no saves of any kind allowed, and you must roll again
Artefact.Description: Every time an enemy model suffers an unsaved wound from this weapon, roll a D6. On the result of a 6, the enemy loses an additional wound, with no saves of any kind allowed, and you must roll again. Keep on rolling as long as the result is a 6.

Artefact.Name: Blade-Blunter Armour
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: At the end of each round of close combat, roll a D6 for each magic weapon that hit the wearer of the armour: on the result of a 2+, the enemy item loses its special rules and ceases to count as a magic weapon
Artefact.Description: Heavy armour. At the end of each round of close combat, roll a D6 for each magic weapon that hit the wearer of the armour. On the result of a 2+, the enemy item loses its special rules and ceases to count as a magic weapon. Instead it will count as a normal weapon of its type for the remainder of the battle.

Artefact.Name: Trollhide
Artefact.Description: Light armour. The wearer gains the Regeneration rule.

Artefact.Name: Pelt of The Shadowgave
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: All shooting attacks directed at the character or his unit are at -1 To Hit
Spells that target the character or his unit deduct 2 from the casting roll
Artefact.Description: Light armour. All shooting attacks directed at the bearer or his unit are at -1 To Hit. Spells that target the bearer or his unit deduct 2 from the casting roll.

Artefact.Name: Blackened Plate
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: 2+ Ward save against all flaming attacks
Models in any unit that he is with have a 4+ Ward save against flaming attacks
Artefact.Description: Heavy armour. The wearer of the Blackened Plate has a 2+ Ward save against all flaming attacks. Models in any unit that he is with have a 4+ Ward save against such attacks.

Artefact.Name: Ramhorn Helm
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: For every armour save he passes, the character may immediately make a bonus attack at his basic Strength
Artefact.Description: 6+ armour save. This may be combined with other armour as normal. For every armour save he passes, the bearer may immediately make a bonus attack at his basic Strength.

Artefact.Name: Shard of The Herdstone
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: After deployment zones have been agreed, but before the armies have been deployed, place an appropriate terrain piece to represent the herdstone in your deployment zone: at the start of your Magic phase each friendly Wizard within 6" of the herdstone generates an additional power dice
Artefact.Description: After deployment zones have been agreed, but before the armies have been deployed, place an appropriate terrain piece to represent the herdstone in your deployment zone. At the start of your Magic phase each friendly Wizard within 6" of the herdstone generates an additional power dice.

Artefact.Name: Horn of The Great Hunt
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Bound Spell, Power Level 3: it counts as the Bestial Surge spell, except that every friendly Beastman unit within 36" is affected
Artefact.Description: Bound Spell. Power Level 3. It counts as the Bestial Surge spell, except that every friendly Beastman unit within 36" is affected.

Artefact.Name: Horn of The First Beast
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: All Beastmen units within 36" can re-roll failed Primal Fury tests
Artefact.Description: All Beastmen units within 36" can re-roll failed Primal Fury tests.

Artefact.Name: Stone of Spite
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Bound spell, Power Level 5, one use only: every Arcane Item within 18" immediately explodes in the hands of its bearer (friend and foe), each bearer of an Arcane Item within range suffers D6 Strength 4 hits per item
Artefact.Description: One use only. Bound spell. Power Level 5. Every Arcane Item within 18" immediately explodes in the hands of its bearer (friend and foe). Each bearer of an Arcane Item within range suffers D6 Strength 4 hits per item. The items are immediately destroyed.

Artefact.Name: Skin of Man
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Scout
Artefact.Description: The bearer of the Skin of Man has the Scout ability.

Artefact.Name: Cacophonous Dirge
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Enemy musicians fighting in the same combat as the character have no effect.
Artefact.Description: Enemy musicians fighting in the same combat as the bearer have no effect.

Artefact.Name: Eye of Night
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Magic Resistance(2)

If an enemy Wizard within 24" attempts to cast a spell from the Lore of Life, the Lore of Heavens or the Lore of Light and suffers a miscast, you may force them to re-roll the result on the Miscast table
Artefact.Description: The Eye of Night grants the bearer Magic Resistance (2). In addition, if an enemy Wizard within 24" attempts to cast a spell from the Lore of Life, the Lore of Heavens or the Lore of Light and suffers a miscast, you may force them to re-roll the result on the Miscast table.

Artefact.Name: Chalice of Dark Rain
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Once per game, for the rest of the phase, all enemy missile units are at -1 To Hit, weapons or attacks that do not use Ballistic Skill may only fire on the roll of a 4+
Artefact.Description: One use only. At the beginning of the enemy Shooting phase, the bearer can summon a storm of mud and worms with which to blind his enemies. For the rest of the phase, all enemy missile units are at -1 To Hit. Weapons or attacks that do not use Ballistic Skill may only fire on the roll of a 4+.

Artefact.Name: Skull of Rarkos
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: All friendly Beastman Wizards within 6" (including the character himself) add 1 to their casting results
Artefact.Description: All friendly Beastman Wizards within 6" (including the bearer himself) add 1 to their casting results.

Artefact.Name: Staff of Darkoth
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Bound spell, Power Level 3: Viletide spell
Artefact.Description: Bound spell. Power Level 3. This item casts the Viletide spell.

Artefact.Name: Hagtree Fetish
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Choose an enemy unit within 24" at the start of each Magic phase: any failed To Wound rolls made during the Magic phase against that unit may be re-rolled
Artefact.Description: Choose an enemy unit within 24" at the start of each Magic phase. Any failed To Wound rolls made during the Magic phase against that unit may be re-rolled.

Artefact.Name: Jagged Dagger
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Each model kept to the side in such a manner may be 'expended' in the Magic phase to allow the character to roll an additional power dice
Artefact.Description: Each model kept to the side in such a manner may be 'expended' in the Magic phase to allow the bearer to roll an additional power dice.

Artefact.Name: The Beast Banner
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Unit have a +1 bonus to Strength
Artefact.Description: The bearer and any unit he has joined have a +1 bonus to their Strength.

Artefact.Name: Totem of Rust
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: All units in base contact with the unit, including the unit itself, treat their armour saves as two worse than it actually is instead
Artefact.Description: All units in base contact with the unit carrying the totem, including the unit itself, treat their armour saves as two worse than it actually is instead. This does not affect Scaly Skin saves!

Artefact.Name: Manbane Standard
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: All enemy units within 6" suffer -1 to their Leadership characteristic
Artefact.Description: All enemy units within 6" of the Manbane Standard suffer -1 to their Leadership characteristic.

Artefact.Name: The Banner of Outrage
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Automatically passes Primal Fury tests
Enemy units Hate the unit
Artefact.Description: The bearer's unit automatically passes Primal Fury tests (there is no need to roll). Enemy units Hate the bearer's unit.

Special.SpecialRuleDescription: Any unit accompanied is also subject to Frenzy, but not to the Primal Fury rule

HandWeapon.Name: Tusks, hooves and a bad attitude

Special.SpecialRuleDescription: When fighting enemy Wizards, models with any sort of magic item or magical attacks, Undead, or creatures with a ward save, the Cygor may re-roll any failed To Hit rolls

Enemy Wizards within 24" of one or more Cygors must take a Leadership test at the beginning of the Magic phase, if the test is failed any spell he fails to cast this Magic phase will result in a miscast

May forego all of its normal attacks and instead make a single special attack at an Initiative of 1: this attack has the Killing Blow ability, but To Wound rolls of a 4, 5 or 6 act as Killing Blow attacks, instead of just rolls of 6
Each time a Ghorgon causes a Killing Blow with its Swallow Whole ability, it regains D3 Wounds that it has lost earlier in the battle

Each enemy unit within 12" of one or more Jabberslythes at the beginning of the Beastmen Magic phase must take a Leadership test: for every point by which a unit fails its test, it suffers a wound with no armour saves allowed - some of its members have gone irrevocably insane!
For every wound caused on a Jabberslythe in close combat, the attacking unit immediately suffers a S5 hit, randomised as shooting
